yok aragalayedi ihala kanediyanu parlimenthu godanagili gini thabimata paliganimak washayen,1812 yuddhaya aarambhawimen anathuruwa warsha 1814di woshintanaya giniganna atharathura,brithanya hamudawa wisin dhawala mandirayata gini thabana ladi.woshintanaye sahena pramanayak mema ginithabim walin winashayata pathwiya.dhawala mandiraye pitatha biththi pamanak ithiri wiya.dakunu dishawe biththiya hara ginnen winasha wu siyalu pitatha biththi nawatha idikirimata siduwuye ginnen wu haniya hethuweni.brithanya hamudawa wisin dhawala mandiraya kollakamedi paharagena yana lada badubahiradiyen nawatha laba ganimata hakiwuye ayithama dekak pamanaki.sewakayin saha wahalun wisin jorj woshintange siththamak bera ganna ladi.1939di kanediyanu jathikayeku wisin ohuge siya woshintanayen laba ganna lada aabharana pettiyak janadhipathi franklin di.ruswelt hata bhara di atha.warsha 1814 nowambar masa 24wana dina rathi්raye athiwu kunatuwa hethuwen ech.em.es. fantom wisin meheyawana lada halifaks bala yathra kala brithanya naukawa diyabath wima hethuwen ehi thibu bohomayak bhanda winasha wu bawa samaharun chodana kalath fantom ee pilibandawa madihath wi nomatha.
